actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve the administration of the provisions thereof relating to compensation for Government employee work injuries through the establishment of medical review boards to review occupational disease claims, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for review of Federal occupational injuries by medical review boards in the administration of compensation for such employee work injuries. (Admends 5 U.S.C. 8122(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve the administration of the provisions thereof relating to compensation for Government employee work injuries through the establishment of medical review boards to review occupational disease claims, and for other purposes.
